page.title: 03CARLISLE-SETTLE RAILWAY LINE
page.content: BRITISH RAIL ARE TRYING TO CLOSE THE 72 MILES LONG CARLISLE_SETTLE LINE, ONCE DESCRIBED AS THE ONLY MOUNTAIN RAILWAY IN THE WORLD FOR EXPRESS TRAINS.ITS 20 VIADUCTS ARE FALLING APART AND IT WILL COST MILLIONS OF POUNDS TO REPAIR THEM.PEOPLE ARE PROTESTING TO KEEP IT OPEN.ITS RUN THROUGH SPECTACULAR PENNINE SCENERY INCORPORATES DENT STATION, THE HIGHEST IN ENGLAND AT 1100FT,AND THE HIGHEST MAIN LINE AT THE SUMMIT OF AIS GILL OF 1162FT.BRITISH RAIL STILL RUN STEAM TRAINS ALONG THE TRACK,BUT THE THREAT OF CLOSURE REMAINS.THE NAMES OF FAMOUS ENGINES THAT ONCE PASSED ALONG THIS FEAT OF BRITISH ENGINERING INCLUDE MALLARD,THE WORLDS FASTEST STEAM TRAIN AT 126 M.P.H.( 210 K.P.H. ),THE ROYAL SCOT,FLYING SCOTSMAN AND THE SIR NIGEL GRESLEY, THE SAME CLASS AS MALLARD.
